column2: an A.M. Eatery////Snooze Spuds Deluxe: 4 stars. You get to pick 2 ingredients to add onto the dish.  The flavors were good
column3: but the hash browns were NOT brown at all... more like "hash whites." I've never seen such white/un-browned hash browns before.  Kind of weird. Not sure if that was an error or if that's how it always is here. FYI the soy chorizo is quite salty. Overall
column4: I would order this dish again though.
